content:
Here is the updated table with the additional columns:

**Loyalty Program** | **Current Points** | **Reward Threshold** | **Reward** | **Rewards Redeemed** | **Next Reward** | **Expiration Date**
---------------------|------------------|--------------------|-----------|-------------------|----------------|-------------------
Brewed Awakening   | **?**           | 250               | Free Coffee |                   |                |
The Daily Grind   | **?**           | ?                  | ?          | 1 free breakfast sandwich (200 points) |                |
PetPal           | 200           | ? (Silver Tier)     | 10% off all purchases |                   |                |
SmartMart        | 500           | 500               | $5 discount on next purchase |                   |                |
StyleHub        | 250           | 250               | $25 gift card (during sale) |                   |                |
GasGo           | 50           | Varies (Rewards Catalog) | Discounts on gas, car washes, etc. |                   |                |

Please fill in your current points for Brewed Awakening and The Daily Grind.

The "Next Reward" column can help you focus on what you're working towards, and the "Expiration Date" column can remind you of any deadlines for redeeming rewards or earning points.

Let me know if you have any other requests or if there's anything else I can do to help!
